mapper.insert: insert into memo (mno,user_id,memo_title,memo_cont, memo_color, memo_public, memo_update, memo_modifydate) values (memo_seq.nextval,#{user_id},#{memo_title},#{memo_cont}, #{memo_color},'1',sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select mno,user_id,memo_title,memo_cont,memo_viewcnt,memo_color,memo_public,memo_update,memo_modifydate from memo where user_id = #{user_id} AND memo_public = '1' order by memo_modifydate desc )

select mno,user_id,memo_title,memo_cont,memo_viewcnt,memo_color, to_char(memo_update,'YYYY-MM-DD') as memo_update,to_char(memo_modifydate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as memo_modifydate from memo where memo_public ='1' order by mno desc
